These offers are located at OVH Canada, with 1Gbps guaranteed bandwidth ("Premium Bandwidth OVH/Internet"). No SLA guarantee on these offers, but if a node goes down all VPS's affected get a free month of service. This does not cover DDoS attacks, but the node is covered by OVH's anti DDoS and we can customise permanent mitigation or firewall rules as required. Min node specs for this offer run are either E3 or E5's with 32GB RAM, and weekly offsite backups.
